title: Got out of Bronze, chances of going back?
body: Got placed in B5 this year, climbed to B2 in like three days and then keep lurking around B2-B1. I got into Silv 5 today. Is there chance of getting demoted? I heard rumours about it being impossible to get dropped down a complete rank?

replies.body: silver is crap. run away dude. run far.dont look back
If you hit the MMR of a Bronze V again you'll demote.

if you suck then expect to go back, but you will only go down from S5 when your MMR is too low to belong in Silver elo bracket.

Otherwise it's not a chance thing, at least not entirely since you get 4 other variables on your team, but at least it's better than enemy team's 5.
So it IS possible to get dropped back down then? Fair enough

> [{quoted}](name=TSM BjergWannabe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Gc8jEk7e,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-27T09:55:30.233+0000)
>
> So it IS possible to get dropped back down then? Fair enough

It's possible, if you constantly lose games at silver 5 then yes you'll get dropped, but honestly if you're careful enough with your games in terms of farming over fighting stupid fights every chance you get and influencing other lanes once you've won yours you should be climbing steadily instead of worrying about dropping.
if you are ever on my team ill make sure you go back to bronze

> [{quoted}](name=Homura Akemi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Gc8jEk7e,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-27T10:04:18.210+0000)
>
> if you are ever on my team ill make sure you go back to bronze
